reviews.review: Has honestly yoink 6 years off my life span. Yet, i always come back.
bad game, combat is stiff, story sucks, and their isnt a heal mechanic, neil druckmann really ruined this game
Thank you for making me happy lewl
You've got to take the good with the bad, smile with the sad, love what you've got, and remember what you had. Always forgive, but never forget. Learn from mistakes, but never regret.

i hate this game so goddamn much

10/10

A lot of people love CSGO and its predecessors but i've always found it to be a bit too basic and boring for my taste. A lot of the mechanics have always felt like people trying to extract as much as they possibly can from what available in the game since it's only made up of the most basic standard guns and grenades and the most popular maps are relatively straightforward 3-4 lane maps. Just not my cup of tea.
